title: Demi Vollering Lays Down Warning Shot Ahead of Alpe d’Huez Decider: ‘I Wanted to Make Kasia Nervous’
content:
SD Worx-Protime star happy about small gap at stage 7 finish and packs 'good feeling' about winning race on final-stage showdown as Tour de France Femmes goes down to the wire.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering Lays Down Warning Shot Ahead of Alpe d’Huez Decider: ‘I Wanted to Make Kasia Nervous’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
